name: Gamemaker Transition Pack
description:
This is a completely free asset pack for room transitions in GameMaker.

The transitions included are as follows:

  • Circle Grow - A circle that grows and shrinks
  • Triangle Rotate - A triangle that rotates and grows and then shrinks
  • Square Rotate - A square that rotates and grows and then shrinks
  • Stretch Vertical - Stretches a rectangle down across the screen
  • Stretch Horizontal - Stretches a rectangle across the screen horizontally.
